content: Their job is to ensure patients receive the essential dialysis treatments to stay healthy. Imagine them as your own personal support system for dialysis. Every day, they diligently monitor our Electronic Health Records (EHR). When they see a patient has missed their scheduled appointment, they spring into action.Here’s how our team ensures that you never miss a dialysis session:Monitoring: The team monitors our electronic health records (EHR) closely throughout the day.Reaching Out: If they see that someone has missed their appointment by more than an hour, they’ll call them right away.Contacting Someone You Trust: If they can’t reach them directly, they’ll call someone from their emergency contact list.Rescheduling Your Treatment: The team will explain the importance of the missed treatment and work with the patient to get them back on track. They can help reschedule the treatment for the same day or later that week.Transportation Assistance: The team won’t leave the patient stranded if transportation is an issue. They’ll work with them to find a way to get them to their appointment safely.Celebrating Patient Commitment with DCC ChampionsWe understand the importance of patients committing to their dialysis schedules.
title: DCC Missed Treatments Program - Dialysis Care Center
